name: Water Gun
description:
## Water Gun

Get ready for some good old-fashioned fun in the sun with this playful and exciting water gun that's perfect for splashing around with your friends and family.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
[Bumpkins](https://docs.bumpkins.io/getting-started/about)
